snippet.title: Enemy: Tempest Of Violence (amiga)
snippet.description:
Intro + levels 1-5 with all mission briefing screens. This is an optimized version of the original game in english language (not including the intro).

Level 1: brief 06:51 - level start 09:23
Level 2: brief 14:19 - level start 15:57 (code: FEAR)
Level 3: brief 25:38 - level start 27:47 (code: FIGHT)
Level 4: brief 36:40 - level start 38:28 (code: SHOOT)
Level 5: brief 48:42 - level start 50:33 (code: WAR)
Level 6: brief 56:28 (code: DEATH)

First levels are just running around while mapping and I'm not too keen about such gameplay on any genre. The game does make progress, though slowly and there is more stuff to see and do at later levels. I do like various aspects about this game, but imo it's little bit too slow, mazy and long to complete with 32 levels. There's a sequel on it's way.

Developer: André Wüthrich
Music: Michael Tschögl
Publisher: Anachronia (1997-2011)

Homepage and download: http://www.anachronia.ch/

http://www.lemonamiga.com/games/details.php?id=2075
http://hol.abime.net/2856
